reviews.review: This game gave me so many fun experiences like bullying russians, romanians, homeless indians. I recommend it for everyone bc of the game graphics, the mechanics and there's no need to buy an expensive pc to get an experience (I reached gold nova on my 6 year old laptop). Also it is free, so come and play it!
ну че сказать , а нечего говорить
Топовая игра !! Очень помогает разгрузиться после работы !)))
Я написал это только чтобы повысить уровень стим
玩过最有感觉的射击游戏

I think Valve is a good company, they CARE about player's game experience more than anythings like new skins and battle passes.
The weapon is VERY BALANCE, T side can one tap CT with AK which only cost $2700 ,where CT got M4 cost $3100 which cant even kill one person with a headshot . Very beautiful Very powerful . 

What More? Map.  I must say THE MOST BALANCE MAP is Inferno, the Haven of CT. Who begin with side CT in this map must be blessed by Gabe Newell.

Talking about the gaming experience, I dont know is the matching system broken or what, how come a MGE matched with some sliver teammate? Moreover, The ranking system is like shit, none of the data tell us how the game determine our mmr ranking, you can stuck with the same rank even you continue winning 5 matches, the less you play, the easier your rank getting up.

Finally, the Anti-Cheat system, Valve finally did a GREAT JOB, the VAC system is very powerful that almost no clean player in the Non-prime CSGO server. In the other hand, Prime server is really better. However, I don't know is Value get drunk or what, they give the [Overwatch] permission to players with some condition, what happened is people selling those account and some new player bought, they will think everyone is cheating(lack of game experience), then determine players should be banned, this Overwatch System have costing so many innocent player getting banned.

In conclusion, the game is broken and not suggest unless fixing the problem mentioned.
If you still thinking should you buy prime upgrade? My advice is NO unless you are rich and have friendly friend to play with you, otherwise, you should use this money to buy some new FPS popular games.
